about_the_game: The Prologue for The Orphanage is a small taste of what is to come from the full game. In the Prologue you take control of Jack, Another of the Children of the Orphanage who awakes in the basement on an operating bed. Unsure of whats going on, Jack has only one thing to do.. Escape and find help.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains mild images of gore and violence

detailed_description: The Prologue for The Orphanage is a small taste of what is to come from the full game. In the Prologue you take control of Jack, Another of the Children of the Orphanage who awakes in the basement on an operating bed. Unsure of whats going on, Jack has only one thing to do.. Escape and find help.
legal_notice: All characters, events, music and locations are completely fictional, any coincidences with real people, other works, films and games are random.
name: The Orphanage Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX570
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 Bit
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX1060 3GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 Bit
